data: {"concept_id": "voice_inside_out", "concept_name": "Voice (Part 6)", "set": "Narrative/Voice", "type": "element", "definition": "Flip structure: start with indulgent seeds, let world rules and pressure create plot and truthful endings.", "axes": "seed_type|world_rule_origin|pressure_point|plot_motion|ending_truth", "axis_values": "image|line|vibe|memory|rant | grief|betrayal|attention|regret|other | desire|fear|denial|shame | poke|deny|heat|break | inevitable|merciful|cruel|ambiguous", "source_file": "Voice Part 6.md", "source_md5": "97ddccc7f20af2bed025e6ebbf1f8bc0", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:11:05.628623Z"}
